title: 2024's greatest hits on Google TV
description: See Google TV’s top entertainment from 2024 in collections like “most watched movies” and “most watched shows.”
author: Gabby WilliamsAssociate Product Marketing ManagerGoogle TV
excerpt: See Google TV’s top entertainment from 2024 in collections like “most watched movies” and “most watched shows.”
text: Nov 21, 2024 [[read-time]] min read Google TV’s annual recap highlights top entertainment trends from 2024. This year's top entertainment on Google TV had it all: action-packed thrills, dramatic twists, and even a few laughs. But with so much great content out there, it can be hard to keep up.Today, we’re making it easier for you to look back at the most popular shows, movies, and music from this year with the Best of 2024 collection on Google TV devices and the Google TV app. So whether you’re in the mood to re-watch, or finally tune in to that show everyone was talking about, Google TV makes it easier to choose what to watch, with the best of 2024 all in one place.You can save Best of 2024 content to your watchlist to enjoy later and share your favorite titles with friends and family using the share button on the Google TV app.Dive into action with the most watched movieLooking for a good action thriller for your next movie night? “Road House,” the remake of the 1989 classic, has an edge-of-your-seat plot, a superstar cast, and a touch of nostalgia. Check Be a part of the action with the most watched movie from 2024, ”Road House.” Immerse yourself into a new world with this most-watched showThis year, our TVs also became portals to different worlds, times and places, like the ancient Japanese empire featured in “Shōgun.” The show’s phenomenal storytelling helped the show top the most watched charts on Google TV in 2024. Immerse yourself in the world of “Shōgun,” the most watched show from 2024. Discover something new with Google TV staff picksJust like you, the Google TV team couldn't get enough of all of the great movies and shows that came out this year. And in our opinion,"Challengers," the new season of "Hacks," and "Dune: Part Two" are must-watch films and episodes for 2024. Check out Google TV Staff Picks like “Challengers,” “Hacks,” and “Dune: Part Two.” Score a deal with the most watched free live channelsWith Google TV you have access to more than 150 free live TV channels right out of the box, with no downloads or subscriptions necessary. This year, viewers spent the most time tuned in to ION Television, where they were able to catch up on the latest games and hit shows like “Law & Order: Special Victims Unit” and “FBI.” Catch up on the latest games, crime shows, and more on ION Television, our most watched free live channel of 2024. Check out the Best of 2024 on Google TVStarting today, Google TV users in the U.S. can find Best of 2024 located under the “For you” tab on the Google TV Streamer (4K), Google TV built-in devices, and Google TV app for Android and iOS. Plus, explore a world of entertainment with Peacock, a streaming app optimized for Google TV and recognized as a “Best for Google TV” winner by Google Play. Want to experience more amazing apps? You can now download all the best apps of 2024 from the Play Store today.
html:
Nov 21, 2024

[[read-time]] min read

Google TV’s annual recap highlights top entertainment trends from 2024.

This year's top entertainment on Google TV had it all: action-packed thrills, dramatic twists, and even a few laughs. But with so much great content out there, it can be hard to keep up.

Today, we’re making it easier for you to look back at the most popular shows, movies, and music from this year with the Best of 2024 collection on Google TV devices and the Google TV app. So whether you’re in the mood to re-watch, or finally tune in to that show everyone was talking about, Google TV makes it easier to choose what to watch, with the best of 2024 all in one place.

You can save Best of 2024 content to your watchlist to enjoy later and share your favorite titles with friends and family using the share button on the Google TV app.

Dive into action with the most watched movie

Looking for a good action thriller for your next movie night? “Road House,” the remake of the 1989 classic, has an edge-of-your-seat plot, a superstar cast, and a touch of nostalgia. Check

Immerse yourself into a new world with this most-watched show

This year, our TVs also became portals to different worlds, times and places, like the ancient Japanese empire featured in “Shōgun.” The show’s phenomenal storytelling helped the show top the most watched charts on Google TV in 2024.

Discover something new with Google TV staff picks

Just like you, the Google TV team couldn't get enough of all of the great movies and shows that came out this year. And in our opinion,"Challengers," the new season of "Hacks," and "Dune: Part Two" are must-watch films and episodes for 2024.

Score a deal with the most watched free live channels

With Google TV you have access to more than 150 free live TV channels right out of the box, with no downloads or subscriptions necessary. This year, viewers spent the most time tuned in to ION Television, where they were able to catch up on the latest games and hit shows like “Law & Order: Special Victims Unit” and “FBI.”

Check out the Best of 2024 on Google TV

Starting today, Google TV users in the U.S. can find Best of 2024 located under the “For you” tab on the Google TV Streamer (4K), Google TV built-in devices, and Google TV app for Android and iOS. Plus, explore a world of entertainment with Peacock, a streaming app optimized for Google TV and recognized as a “Best for Google TV” winner by Google Play. Want to experience more amazing apps? You can now download all the best apps of 2024 from the Play Store today.
